title: क्या उत्तर प्रदेश के बदायूं में पुलिस बंदूक की नोक पर कर रही है वाहन चेकिंग?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: We have come across this video thru social media regarding which SP Badayun has informed that it was a tactical checking done for demonstrative purpose in case the person being checked is a criminal carrying weapon.There was no intention to intimidate the citizens. Version of SP https://t.co/4gkELgny2x pic.twitter.com/DE57KDEiZ4
